<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">tavola periodica</string>
            <string language="en">The periodic table</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die periodische Tabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La table périodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tabela periódica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο περιοδικός πίνακας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El vector periódico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Scopri i primi 20 elementi della tavola periodica. Impara a costruire diverse sostanze</string>
            <string language="en">Learn the 20 first elements in the periodic table. Learn to construct different substances.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">tavola periodica</string>
            <string language="en">periodic table</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie die 20 ersten Elemente in der 
periodischen Tabelle. Erlernen Sie, unterschiedliche Substanzen 
zu konstruieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez les 20 premiers éléments dans la table 
périodique. Apprenez à construire différentes substances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda os 20 primeiros elementos na tabela 
periódica. Aprenda construir substâncias diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε τα 20 πρώτα στοιχεία στον περιοδικό πίνακα. 
Μάθετε να κατασκευάζετε τις διαφορετικές ουσίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda los 20 primeros elementos en el vector 
periódico. Aprenda construir diversas sustancias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Tabelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">table périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tabela periódica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοδικός πίνακας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vector periódico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
